description: ROI configuration for new sensor location - green area monitoring
notes: GREEN AREA FOCUS: Left side of image (0% to 50% width)
EXCLUDES: Right side parking lot with vehicles
EXCLUDES: Sky and buildings in background
Monitor vehicles passing through the green designated area
Coordinates based on user-specified green area of interest

right_parking_area.description: Parking lot with trucks - exclude from detection

sky_area.description: Sky and buildings - exclude from detection
